title: cloudfirst
extract: Cloud First is a term rapidly gaining popularity, but what does it mean? ... Beginning as a U.S. government initiative in 2010, the Cloud First mandate was a single policy in a 25-point plan to reform the federal government's information technology (IT) management.May 3, 2017
extract_html: Cloud First is a term rapidly gaining popularity, but what does it mean? ... Beginning as a U.S. government initiative in 2010, the Cloud First mandate was a single policy in a 25-point plan to reform the federal government's information technology (IT) management.May 3, 2017
